reporter-output.line: Open url 'http://qa4.qa.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter the user's email address in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter the user's password in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Sticky Edit Actions' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Sticky Edit Actions' to appear in the list.
Enter 'Devel' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Devel' to appear in the list.
Enter 'ImageField Focus' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'ImageField Focus' to appear in the list.
Enter 'Database logging' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Database logging' to appear in the list.
Enter 'Pub Post' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Pub Post' to appear in the list.
Verify the 'Pub Post' check box is checked.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.

Wait for file upload to reach 100%

Verify there are no errors present.
